title: Elias03r
author: Elias03r
content: Bitcoin 33,000....soon to be 21,000...Etherium classic will soon disperse....gen Zs retirement disappeared into smithereens.

comments.author: virtualdn
comments.body: That's right folks. You better listen to this newbie and sell all your Bitcoins to me. Why are such posts even allowed I wonder. The truth is this world would be so boring without the usual naysayers. Keep posting guys.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Quote from: Elias03r on May 09, 2022, 12:06:08 PMBitcoin 33,000....soon to be 21,000...Etherium classic will soon disperse....gen Zs retirement disappeared into smithereens. You have given your analysis, sort of. One quick question tho; why are you on the platform if you feel it's 'a matter of time before it dies?'

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: virtualdn on May 09, 2022, 12:23:09 PMThat's right folks. You better listen to this newbie and sell all your Bitcoins to me.Go to any exchange and put your orders; I guess that there are plenty of FOMO newbies that are panicking there, just like this one.Quote from: virtualdn on May 09, 2022, 12:23:09 PMWhy are such posts even allowed I wonder. The truth is this world would be so boring without the usual naysayers. Keep posting guys.Because it's a free speech forum, no matter how sour are the grapes for this or that.And, indeed, because it would become boring without... these Quote from: Elias03r on May 09, 2022, 12:06:08 PMBitcoin 33,000....soon to be 21,000...Etherium classic will soon disperse....gen Zs retirement disappeared into smithereens.Your expertise looks very convincing. The fact you cannot even spell correctly no matter what altcoin's name (and no matter how its price will evolve) shows the deep extent of the knowledge you're sharing with us.

So yeah enjoy your bleeding charts that will continue to BLEED....Love being right üòÅüòÅYears? It was literally this low in January, June, July and August of last year  If you want to troll at least check the numbers first to make it look like you know something. Making a fool of yourself won't help you persuade people to your theories.

comments.author: Welsh
comments.body: Quote from: Elias03r on May 09, 2022, 05:24:20 PMFunny thing is ...Joke is on yall today lmao looks like this so called "Newbie" was right haha crypto has not been this low in YEARS. So yeah enjoy your bleeding charts that will continue to BLEED....Love being right üòÅüòÅThe thing is; you could've actually looked really cool here, and looked like your were right on the money. However, your exaggeration of the price history is easy to disprove, by checking the price history via charts, and thus any credibility that you might have had would've shot right up. Honestly though, if you're panicking because at the moment you're losing money, my advice would be to hang in there. I know you might be questioning your belief in Bitcoin at this moment, when its taking a dive, but if you look at why Bitcoin should, and has been successful it should restore some faith on why it'll return to higher amounts than it currently is.

I know you might be questioning your belief in Bitcoin at this moment, when its taking a dive, but if you look at why Bitcoin should, and has been successful it should restore some faith on why it'll return to higher amounts than it currently is.¬† Still bleeding pal, check the charts, and a word of advice, invest in LOOPRING....its about to take off..THIS...will go very high very soon.He took off to fly further that would be for sure.Almost all of them have complained because they think that the current picture of bitcoin's movement is the end of everything even though this is just a common thing that happened a few years ago, it's just that we can't be patient enough to wait for the price to recover.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: proudhon is that you? Lol, kidding aside, of course, if you are a smart investor then you can sell your bitcoin right now and then enter later when the price is in the $20k'ish.However, for those who have been worst, not sure if they are rattled by this price action. On the contrary, they are going to scoop a lot of bitcoin from those who are selling because of panic. So still a win-win situation no matter what.And at $21k? capitulation, but then again as I have said, golden opportunity.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: There are a lot of people that are calling it quits. This past few months have been brutal and the final nail on the coffin was what happened in the last couple of weeks.Bitcoin had a nasty day today and a few days prior and so did the stock market. Many have lost all their 20-21 earnings and are down bad and quit.I think the bottom must be near‚Ä¶ at least temporarily.

comments.author: MinMan
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on May 09, 2022, 12:33:59 PMQuote from: Elias03r on May 09, 2022, 12:06:08 PMBitcoin 33,000....soon to be 21,000...Etherium classic will soon disperse....gen Zs retirement disappeared into smithereens.Your expertise looks very convincing. The fact you cannot even spell correctly no matter what altcoin's name (and no matter how its price will evolve) shows the deep extent of the knowledge you're sharing with us.The funny thing is, if anyone actually believes that bitcoin could be 21k, they could get rich beyond our wildest dreams if they are right. Just get as high of a leverage as you can, the max I have seen so far was 150x if I am not wrong but if you can find bigger, just find it. Sell all the possessions you ever have, sell all of them, for half of the price, fraction of the price if you have to, then put it on that leverage.If you are right, and the price goes from 30k to 20k, then you will make so much money that you wouldn't even believe t, a few thousand would turn into a million, all of your possessions would probably worth more than a few thousand, so you will be multi millionaire very very easily, maybe like even hundred million if you have a lot.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Elias03r on May 09, 2022, 12:06:08 PMBitcoin 33,000....soon to be 21,000...Etherium classic will soon disperse....gen Zs retirement disappeared into smithereens.This website may die, but not from the exchange rate.¬† More likely it will be taken over by spammers and con artists that force out any legitimate use of Bitcoin, then if not countered with action will likely result in a downward spiral to insignificance.In reality, this website was at it's peak as far as a being a positive learning environment to discuss crypto back when Bitcoin was around $5.¬† I've said it before, but I'd happily accept a return to the $5 exchange rate if that meant this place could be a home for Bitcoin activity and a positive place to build on Bitcoin again.¬† It would be worth it in the long run.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: TravelMug on May 10, 2022, 02:56:27 AMis that you?Don't tempt him! I am 99% sure he has notifications for his name and the time is also right for his predictions.Also, it cannot be him, since that one doesn't seem to take the things so serious and also enjoys posting on bitcointalk....And it has just occurred to me that OP is right: it's just a matter of time until this website, human kind, earth and the entire galaxy dies; heck, it stands true even for this universe itself.
